short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save content to your Personal.ai account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with Personal.ai, allowing you to effortlessly save web content and to your Personal.ai memory. With an intuitive interface and powerful features, it enhances your digital memory and knowledge management experience.

Key Features
Save Web Pages: Quickly save the current web page to your Personal.ai memory with just a click.
Automatic Tag Generation: The extension automatically generates relevant tags based on the page content, saving you time and improving organization.
Custom Tagging: Add your own tags to further categorize and organize your saved content.
Persona Management: Organize your memories by selecting different personas (domains) for both web pages and file uploads.
Settings Management: Conveniently manage your API key and personas within the extension.

How It Works
Enter your Personal.ai API key to connect the extension to your account.
For web pages, simply click the extension icon, review the auto-generated tags, add custom tags if desired, select a persona, and save.
For file uploads, use the drag-and-drop area or file selector, add tags, choose a persona, and upload directly to your Personal.ai memory.

This extension streamlines the process of saving and organizing digital content in your Personal.ai memory, making it an indispensable tool for knowledge workers, researchers, and anyone looking to enhance their digital memory capabilities.

Note: This extension requires a Personal.ai account and API key to function.
